description: A disciple of the adepti, Shenhe is a Cryo polearm user from Liyue who excels at buffing Cryo DMG and supporting her team.
info: Shenhe is a 5★ Cryo support who excels at buffing Cryo DMG and supporting Cryo DPS units. Build her for ATK%, Energy Recharge, and CRIT.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Dawnstar Piercer
skills.desc: Performs up to 5 consecutive spear strikes.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 5 consecutive spear strikes.
Charged Attack
Consumes stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Spring Spirit Summoning
skills.desc: Shenhe grants all nearby party members the Icy Quill effect and deals Cryo DMG. Press: Rushes forward. Hold: Deals AoE Cryo DMG.
skills.details_html:
Spring Spirit Summoning
Grants all nearby party members the Icy Quill effect and deals Cryo DMG. Press: Rushes forward, dealing Cryo DMG. Hold: Deals AoE Cryo DMG. Icy Quill increases Cryo DMG dealt by party members based on Shenhe's ATK.

skills.name: Divine Maiden's Deliverance
skills.desc: Shenhe creates a Talisman Spirit field that deals AoE Cryo DMG and decreases Cryo/Physical RES of enemies inside.
skills.details_html:
Divine Maiden's Deliverance
Creates a Talisman Spirit field that deals AoE Cryo DMG and decreases Cryo/Physical RES of enemies inside. Field scales with Shenhe's ATK.

passive_talents.name: Deific Embrace
passive_talents.desc: An active character within the field created by Divine Maiden's Deliverance gains 10% Cryo DMG Bonus.

passive_talents.name: Spirit Communion Seal
passive_talents.desc: After using Spring Spirit Summoning, all party members' Elemental Skill and Burst DMG is increased by 15% for 10s.

passive_talents.name: Precise Comings and Goings
passive_talents.desc: When dispatched on an expedition in Liyue, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

constellations.name: Clarity of Heart
constellations.desc: Spring Spirit Summoning can be used 1 additional time.

constellations.name: Centered Spirit
constellations.desc: Divine Maiden's Deliverance lasts 6s longer. Active characters inside the field deal 15% increased Cryo CRIT DMG.

constellations.name: Seclusion
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Spring Spirit Summoning by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Insight
constellations.desc: When characters under the effect of Icy Quill trigger its bonus DMG, Shenhe gains 1 stack of Skyfrost Mantra, increasing her Elemental Skill DMG by 5% for 6s. Max 50 stacks.

constellations.name: Divine Attainment
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Divine Maiden's Deliverance by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Mystical Abandon
constellations.desc: When characters trigger Icy Quill's effect, no trigger count will be consumed for 1s.
